actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide commuter flexible spending arrangements, and for other purposes.
short_title: Family Account to Save on Transportation Act of 2011

summary.text: Family Account to Save on Transportation Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain employer-provided transportation benefits (i.e., commuting and parking costs, transit passes) under tax-qualified flexible spending arrangements, for the two-year period beginning after the enactment of this Act..

titles.title: Family Account to Save on Transportation Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide commuter flexible spending arrangements, and for other purposes.
